title: A learned and comfortable sermon of the certaintie and perpetuitie of faith in the elect especially of the prophet Habakkuks faith. By Richard Hooker, sometimes fellow of Corpus Christi College in Oxford.
author: Hooker, Richard, 1553 or 4-1600.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Ioseph Barnes, and are to be sold by John Barnes dwelling neere Holborne Conduit [, London],
